Articles.Content:
Download for KSP 0.10.1 on MacOS X

Rules

You must use MacOS X, click HERE for the 0.7.3 challenge as this version of the game is newer and thus less awesome and vintage. There's also some cool links to other stuff on that post, such as The Original Kerbo Log.

You must provide a picture of your ship in the VAB or on the Launch Pad.

You must provide at least two pictures of your ship in flight.

If in orbit, you must provide a picture of your Apoapsis and Periapsis.

You must provide a picture of the end flight screen with max altitude and speed.

You may NOT use the design shown above from the orbiter forums.

You MAY use the default vehicle that you get when you click on the Launch Pad. It's so hard to fly that it would be a piloting challenge to do anything with it.

As I don't own a Mac, I will not be submitting my own entry.

To keep it reasonable with the 0.7.3 challenge, DO NOT USE THE MAP VIEW, STRUTS, STACKING TANKS, OR FUEL LINES.

The atmosphere ends at 70 km, just like it does now. In the prior versions, it cut off sharply at 37 km.

Achievments

Circular Orbit: Apoapsis and Periapsis are within 10 km of each other.

Kraken Bait: Go so fast the Kraken attacks.

Clipper: Make Kearth clip away.

It's not easy being green: Have pieces of the spacecraft explode violently and still succeed in the mission.

SRB Champion: Use only SRBs.

Melted: Use only Liquid Fuel Rockets.

Bugger: Exploit a glitch.

I believe I can fly: Use a winged craft like an airplane.

Air Breather: Stay within the 37 km the whole time (not an achievement for the height record.)

Too Stable: Don't use any SAS units.

Safety First: Make sure the Kerbanauts survive landing (must take a picture of the landed pod)

0.10.1 is slightly HARD!

Actually it's not really that hard. It just has a few less features than 0.13.3, the old Demo.
